BLT-reserved.$BLT-RANDOM-NUMBER: random number between minvalue and minvalue - implemented
BLT-reserved.$BLT-INCREMENT: increments the min value to the max value - implemented; will reset to minvalue if increments higher than maxvalue
BLT-reserved.$BLT-DECREMENT: decrements the max value to the min value - implemented; will reset to maxvalue if decrements lower than minvalue
